text: Fimbul is an Old Norse word often used as a prefix for "giant" or "mighty", and may refer to: * Fimbul Glacier, Greenland * Fimbul Ice Shelf, Antarctica == Musical works == *Fimbulvetr, a song by Danheim for his album Herja ==See also== * Fimbulheimen, Antarctica * Fimbulisen, Svalbard * Fimbulwinter, the prelude to the events of Ragnarök
title: Fimbul
